name: RestaurantRoulette
0:
”Alexa, launch restaurant roulette”
”Alexa, ask restaurant roulette to search within 20 miles”
”Alexa, ask restaurant roulette what restaurants are nearby”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restaurant roulette
des: Are you trapped in your third argument this week on where to eat tonight? Have Alexa roll the dice and decide on a random restaurant in the area. Restaurant Roulette uses the Yelp API and a random number generator to help you solve the toughest—and most important—decision of the day.
